games.alt: World of Warcraft began in the early 2000's, now almost 20 years and 7 expansions later, they still have a booming player base.
In the Mists of Pandaria Exapansion, WoW introduced Battle Bets. Explore Azeroth while battling and collecting more!
You'll defeat hundreds of beasts, best many foes and make many friends.
With 13 different races, 2 factions and 12 classes, it's easy to create a character you'll love.
WoW boasts extensive UI functionality allowing for addons and complete customization of their UI despite that their default offers many benefits.
